word: On every occasion be armed and equipped with "It is Written." God is your armor, on the right hand, and on the left.  A flood of hasty words may seek for expression, but say, No; no.  I will not place my feet on Satan's ground.  I will not sacrifice my peace and honor as a child of God.  I will keep in the only safe path, close beside Jesus, who has done so much for me. . . .
